post.body: If he goes to the bar, he'll definitely be red before AND after. :D
No going to the bar for you! :P
Far, far below the awesomeness of open bars.
It looks great!
PICTURE PLEASE! I'm sure you can find a way.
You *gasp* watch TV????
Is that a scythe in your pants or are you just happy to see me?
Well yanno, there's a blizzard. Subtler was telling me about the snow gates. But people still go to the bar in a blizzard.
I'm listening to baby Jesus cry. ;)
Bettie Page is gone. :(
It's cold, snowing and the bus drivers are going on strike tomorrow. All the more reasons to go back to bed.
Damn!!! I forgot how damn cold it gets here.
Bettie Page is in the hospital. Heart attack. :(
Save the Cheerleader! Hiro rocks!
Happiness is warm slippers and ribs for supper.
I need chocolate. STAT!
I can feel death creeping up on me. Or is that Sloot?
Damn, I'm up late!
It's cold out there. I feel nippley.
THOM GOT THE JOB! W00T!
Getting Thom ready for his interview. I now know how to tie a tie.
Forgetting passwords really sucks.
I should be getting ready for work. Not adding to my twitter list.
